mapper.insert:
insert into u_user_extend(user_id, house_addr, now_addr, road_addr, family_tel, work_years, annual_income, occupation, job, children_situation, house_situation, college, local_household, alipay_cert, house_info, estate_desc, car_desc, car_info, other_estate, asset_situation, month_spend, marriage, education, emergency_name, emergency_mobile, comp_name, comp_tel, comp_addr, comp_type, industry_category, payoff_form, work_type, dept, postcode, administrative_level, id_card_validity, now_address_province, now_address_city, company_address_province, company_address_city, company_postcode, job_level, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values
(#{userExtend.userId}, #{userExtend.houseAddr}, #{userExtend.nowAddr}, #{userExtend.roadAddr}, #{userExtend.familyTel}, #{userExtend.workYears}, #{userExtend.annualIncome}, #{userExtend.occupation}, #{userExtend.job}, #{userExtend.childrenSituation}, #{userExtend.houseSituation}, #{userExtend.college}, #{userExtend.localHousehold}, #{userExtend.alipayCert}, #{userExtend.houseInfo}, #{userExtend.estateDesc}, #{userExtend.carDesc}, #{userExtend.carInfo}, #{userExtend.otherEstate}, #{userExtend.assetSituation}, #{userExtend.monthSpend}, #{userExtend.marriage}, #{userExtend.education}, #{userExtend.emergencyName}, #{userExtend.emergencyMobile}, #{userExtend.compName}, #{userExtend.compTel}, #{userExtend.compAddr}, #{userExtend.compType}, #{userExtend.industryCategory}, #{userExtend.payoffForm}, #{userExtend.workType}, #{userExtend.dept}, #{userExtend.postcode}, #{userExtend.administrativeLevel}, #{userExtend.idCardValidity}, #{userExtend.nowAddressProvince}, #{userExtend.nowAddressCity}, #{userExtend.companyAddressProvince}, #{userExtend.companyAddressCity}, #{userExtend.companyPostcode}, #{userExtend.jobLevel}, #{userExtend.createTime}, #{userExtend.modifiedTime})
